snippet.title: The Wild at Heart: 9 Minutes of Gameplay | Gamescom 2020
snippet.description: Check out this exclusive gameplay of The Wild at Heart, a story-rich action-adventure game where you take command of a magical swarm of curious creatures to battle foes and discover the secrets of a forgotten world.
